msbt.message: Halloween is here! The island has such scary and cute vibes going right now. This is the best!Tonight's all about tricks and treats! The most important thing is to share your candy. That's Halloween law.If someone asks for candy, and you don't share yoursheh hehyou'll get pranked! It's going to be so fun!
<10_14 arg="20" />Trick or treeeeat! Time to hand over le candyor face le consequences!
Le treat, please!
Le trick for me!
<10_14 arg="20" />Trick or treeeeat! Time to hand over le candyor face le consequences!
YESSSSS! Candy for meeee! You rock, !
Thank yooou! This was the correct choice, . Trust me.
Now here's a treat for YOU! Have !
I know this is a night for hoarding mondo candy and playing the most outrageous of pranky pranksBut I'm too full of Halloween joy! I HAVE to spread it around! Here's a lollipop, on the house.
Here's a treat for YOU—a recipe for !
Here's a big ol' treat back atcha ! Heh!
Nowlet's get out there and keep this Halloween fright train chuggin' forward, ! WOO-WOOO!
♪ Happy Halloweeeeen! ♪
Oopsyour pockets are full. Busy Halloween, eh? Make some room, then come back for your prezzie!
Awww, your pockets are too full. No room, no prezzie!This treat will seem extra special if you nab it tonight, so make some room and hurry back!
Back for your prezzie? Fab! Enjoy your !
Back for your prezzie? Here's your recipe!
Back for your prezzie? Fab! Enjoy your !
Aww. No candy? I can't prank an unarmed neighborI guess.Go get your hands on some candy, then come back and say no! Then I can prank you reeeal good. Heh!
No candy? Aww. That sitch is no fun on a normal day, but it's SUPER bad on Halloween.You're lucky though! If you DID have candy and STILL said noI wouldn't have held back my big prank. Heh.
Really? THIS is how you want to play it? Well, it is ON now, friend! <10_10 />PRANKS AWAAAY!<10_7 arg="60" />
HUH? Seriously? Then that means a terrible curse must now befall you! <10_10 />HERE COMES LE PRANK!<10_7 arg="60" />

Boom! Consider yourself pranked. This shall be your new form for all eternity! MWAHAHA!Kidding! It's just Halloween makeup. If that's not your style, just check a mirror or vanity to wipe it right off.
If you're not feeling that look, use this !
Oh, and to take off that face paint, you can remove it the same way you change clothes from your pockets!
Prankcomplete! Now, have we learned our lesson? That's right. ALWAYS have candy handy.Althoughit was SUPER fun to prank you again! I could do this all night!

Can I practice something on you? It'll be real quick. Just lower your guard for a sec, 'K?MWAHAHAAAA! Give me CANDY! So? How was that? Did I Scare you? Did you feel MEGA terrified?Hmm. Your skeleton didn't pop out like in cartoons, so I've still got work to do, obvs.You should totes use Reactions like that to frighten other folks today! It's Halloween!
Just press  to pick the Reactions you want to use. Happy haunting!
Whoa, hang on. You don't have ANY candy on you? Not even a single piece?Do you have any idea how SUPER risky that is tonight?! Here, arm yourself with some of my candy!
Now you're ready for anything. Think of it as a bonus treat from Halloween's biggest fan—me!

Check me out! Don't I look utterly, terrifyingly fab in my costume?I bet all the lurking horrors from society's deepest nightmares wish they could look this cute.Sorry, horrors! This look is all mine. They couldn't pull it off anyway. Heh.
This is the most fab day of the year! There's only one thing more fun than scaring your neighbors Getting scared yourself! AND you get candy! Ahhh, I wish Halloween could last forever.

I cannot get over Timmy and Tommy. They look SO PRESH in their little Halloween costumes!Honestly? Everyone looks amazing! Did you see yet?Ahh, I love it here. Everyone puts so much effort into celebrating!
Is it just me, or is the sky over EXTRA weird?I'm, uhgetting a bit creeped out. You don't think anything scary might actually happen tonightdo you?OOOH, I just gave myself shivers This is the best!
Mwahaha! Welcome, welcome to my ultra-fab house of hauntitude! Having fun, ?
Thanks for stopping by! Remember, if you see any horrible monsters out theretotes tell them I said hi!

Whoa, pump le brakes. You know what night it is, !Listen up. I have lots of candy here. And, oh, it is FAB. But you don't get anyuntil you put on a costume!If you want candyyou need to bust out your best scary-style costume! Sorry. I don't make the rules.

Uh-uh. Nope. I just gave you candy a minute ago, !Do a lap. Come back in a bit. Don't worry—I def have enough candy to last the whooole night.I'm just not giving it all to YOU. Go on, get back out there! Go do a Halloween, !
Mwahaha! I've got enough candy to feed the whole island! Here you go!
I still have tons of candy to share. Here, —take more!
I've got a feeling this will be a Halloween that makes the history books. In a good way too!
Happy Halloweeeen! Time to get back to scaring—and GETTING scared! Anything can happen!
OH NO! Your pockets are totes full! I can't give you any of my candy!Sharing candy protects you from the forces of prankitude. Make room and hurry back before the night's over!
So you didn't put on a costume and you don't have any candy?!That's just asking for trouble. I'm not supposed to do this, buthere. Take some of my candy to be safe!
I'm giving you a pass this timebut if you want more candy, you'd better put on a costume, !
Going out and stirring up some Halloween trouble is funbut so is handing out goodies at home!What kinds of ghouls or goblins will turn up next? My imagination is totes running wild! It does that.

Manning the front door is fun, but I might head outside soon to cause some Halloween mischief.Tonight's the one night where it's OK to be a troublemaker. My prank game is too strong to stay in here all night!Don't worry. I won't go TOO crazy out thereby MY standards, that is. Mwahahaaa!

Since I'm this island's top Halloween trendsetter, I super-duper prepped for tonight.I stocked up on enough candy to treat an entire army! But, uh, that doesn't mean I'll load you up.Knocking on everyone's door is half the fun! Go on, get back out there so I can keep stuffing my face with this stockpile.
When you head back out, make sure you've got plenty of candy to share!Or don't—this year's pranks might be WAY too good to miss. Halloween is le best. You win either way!

OHMIGOSH. It's you! It's really you! The great and mighty J-J-Jack!Has the time finally come? Are you here to steal me awayand turn me into your apprentice? I'm SO ready.Wait! No! You're here for c-c-candy! I totes have some for you! As much as you want! Please don't prank me!

I gave you candyso you won't prank me, right? Th-those are your rules! No takesies-backsies!Wait. Back this train all the way up! You're not Jack! You'reyou're just super-trickster !HAHAHA! Oh, you totes got me! You look just like him! Ahh, wow. What a great Halloween prank.You can't tell anyone about all of that apprentice stuff I said, 'K?

Whoa! Wait! Get all the way outta ! You're not Jack!But if you're not Jack Oh! Is this gonna be like a masked-villain reveal at the end of a movie, ?Who's under there? Wait, do I even know you? I don't think I do. In that case Hi! I'm !That costume is super fab, by the way. You totes had me going for a hot minute. What a fright! Ha ha ha!Well, don't be a stranger, OK? We can talk cool costumes and junk!
Oh no! Très oh no! MEGA oh no! I can't give you any candy if your pockets are full!That is NOT my fault! N-not that it's YOUR fault, of course No pranking, right? R-right? Totes spare me!
